item.title: Remote Jupyter notebook locally over ssh gate
item.description: Problem I have encountered several times this problem: Me: I want a nice interface to run python code in a remote machine. Jupyter Notebook: I am here for you. SSH Gate: I’ll make things trickier. Well, here is the guide to setup a jupyter notebook server in a remote machine and connect to it, even if you need to pass through an ssh gate.
